action.primary: Clears Heat, promotes urination, alleviates cough, eliminates Stasis, reduces swellings and resolves toxicity

indications: Jaundice, edema, urinary tract stones, malarial disorder, Lung abscess, cough, hematemesis, turbid painful urinary dysfunction, stranguria, vaginal discharge, Wind-Damp Bi, childhood nutritional impairment, swollen sores, dermatosis and eczema
